namecard.description: Allow me to bear witness to this miracle.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Albedo

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Good morning. Are we going to search for ancient relics today?

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 早安，是准备出门寻找古代遗物吗？
zh.reading: Zǎo'ān, shì zhǔnbèi chūmén xúnzhǎo gǔdài yíwù ma?

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: おはよう、古代遺物を探しに出かけるのかい？
ja.reading: Ohayou, kodai ibutsu wo sagashi ni dekakeru no kai?

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 좋은 아침, 고대 유물 찾으러 갈 준비 됐어?
ko.reading: Joeun achim, godae yumul chajeureo gal junbi dwaesseo?

namecard.description: "The only things researchers should abide by are debates and dialectics. Only by questioning everything at all times can one avoid falling into prejudice."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Alhaitham

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: It's a little early for me... Let me get a cup of coffee first.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 时间还早，我先去喝杯咖啡。
zh.reading: Shíjiān hái zǎo, wǒ xiān qù hē bēi kāfēi.

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: まだ早いな、コーヒーを飲んでこよう。
ja.reading: Mada hayai na, koohii wo nonde koyou.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 아직 시간이 이른데, 가서 커피나 한잔해야겠어
ko.reading: Ajik sigani ireunde, gaseo keopina hanjanhaeyagesseo

namecard.description: "Everything I do is in the service of life, not death."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Aloy

en.title: About Us: Action
en.text: Everything I do is in the service of life, not death. That's why I'm here with you.

zh.title: 关于我们・行动
zh.text: 我的一切行动都是为了拯救生命，而非带来死亡。这就是我与你并肩战斗的原因。
zh.reading: Wǒ de yīqiè xíngdòng dōu shì wèile zhěngjiù shēngmìng, ér fēi dài lái sǐwáng. Zhè jiùshì wǒ yǔ nǐ bìngjiān zhàndòu de yuányīn.

ja.title: 行動について…
ja.text: 私を突き動かす理由は、死をもたらすことではなく、命を救うこと。だからこそ、私はお前と一緒にここにいるんだ。
ja.reading: Watashi wo tsuki usokasu riyuu wa, shi wo motarasu kotode wa naku, inochi wo sukuu koto. Da kara koso, watashi wa omae to issho ni koko ni iru nda.

ko.title: 우리에 대해・행동
ko.text: 난 생명을 죽이기 위해서가 아니라 살리기 위해서 움직여. 그래서 너와 함께 싸우는 거야
ko.reading: Nan saengmyeong'eul jugigi wihaeseoga anira salligi wihaeseo umjigyeo. Geuraeseo neowa hamkke ssauneun geoya

demo_music.name: Good Hunting on a New Horizon

namecard.description: "It's Baron Bunny!"
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Amber

en.title: When It Rains: Worries
en.text: Oh no, it's raining... now my uniform will get all wet...

zh.title: 下雨的时候・担忧
zh.text: 下雨了…蝴蝶结会淋湿的…
zh.reading: Xiàyǔle... Húdíejíe hùi lín shī de...

ja.title: 雨の日・心配
ja.text: 雨だ…リボンが濡れちゃうよ…
ja.reading: Ame da... Ribon ga nurechau yo...

ko.title: 비가 올 때・걱정
ko.text: 비가 오네…. 나비 리본이 젖겠어…
ko.reading: Biga one... Nabi riboni jeotgesseo...

namecard.description: A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Arataki Itto

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: Pff, real men don't carry umbrellas... Oh boy, wow, it's really starting to pick up. Uh quick, c'mon, get yours out! C'mon, quick, quick, quick!

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 男子汉从不打伞…啊这雨也太大了吧，快，快，快开伞！
zh.reading: Nánzǐhàn cóngbù dǎsǎn... a zhè yǔ yě tài dàle ba, kuài, kuài, kuài kāisǎn!

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: 漢は傘なんかささねぇ…って、こりゃ大降りすぎんだろ！はやく、早く傘させ傘ッ！
ja.reading: Otoko wa kasa nanka sasanee... tte, korya ooburisugi ndaro! Hayaku, hayaku kasa sase kasa'!

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 사나이는 우산 따위 쓰지 않아…. 아, 근데 비가 좀 많이 내리네. 빠, 빨리 우산 좀 펴봐!
ko.reading: Sanai-neun usan ttawi sseuji ana.... A, geunde biga jom mani naerine. Ppa, ppalli usan jom pyeobwa!

namecard.description: "Father" laid down the harsh strictures of the House of the Hearth, and some of these seem almost unreasonable. Those familiar with her can use these rules to trace the outline of the ideals she so rarely speaks of.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Arlecchino

en.title: Good Night
en.text: Time to retire for the night. Oh? "Can't sleep," you say? Well, I'm afraid you'll have to figure something out for yourself. I have a certain suspicion my solution won't be to your liking.

zh.title: 晚安…
zh.text: 睡觉的时间到了。「睡不着」？那你得自己想想办法了。我猜你不会喜欢我的方案。

ja.title: おやすみ…
ja.text: もう寝る時間だろう…眠れない？自分でなんとかすることを勧めるよ。おそらく私の案を君は気に入らないと思うからね。
ja.reading: Mou neru jikan darou... Nemurenai? Jibun de nan to ka suru koto wo susumeru yo. Osoraku watashi no an wo kimi wa ki ni iranai to omou kara ne.

ko.title: 굿나잇…
ko.text: 잘 시간이야. 「잠이 안 온다」고? 그럼 알아서 방법을 찾도록 해. 내 방식은 별로 달갑지 않을 테니
ko.reading: Jal siganiya. "Jami an onda"-go? Geureom araseo bangbeobeul chatdorok hae. Nae bangsigeun byeollo dalgapji aneul teni

namecard.description: Sincerity begets longevity.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Baizhu

en.title: About the Vision
en.text: Hehe, the gods have somehow allowed a delusional person such as myself to explore the nature of life and death. This Vision was just the thing I need, and I'm most thankful.

zh.title: 关于「神之眼」…
zh.text: 呵呵，神也允许我这狂妄之人探索生死之道呢。这神之眼来得正好，多谢了。

ja.title: 「神の目」について…
ja.text: ははっ…どうやら神も、狂妄なるこの私に生と死の掟を探るお許しをくださったようです。この神の目は、実に折よくやって来てくれました。感謝しています。

ko.title: 「신의 눈」에 대해…
ko.text: 후후, 신께서도 이 오만한 자가 생사의 길을 탐구하는 걸 허락하셨나 봅니다. 고맙게도, 때마침 신의 눈이 와줬거든요
ko.reading: Huhu, sinkkeseodo i omanhan jaga saengsaui gireul tamguhaneun geol heorakhasyeonna bomnida. Gomapgedo, ttaemachim sinui nuni wajwotgeodeunyo

namecard.description: When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Barbara

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 这样淋着不要紧吗？会感冒的吧？
zh.reading: Zhèyàng línzhe bùyàojǐn ma? Huì gǎnmào de ba?

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: こんなに濡れて大丈夫？風邪ひいちゃうよ？
ja.reading: Konna ni nurete daijoubu? Kaze hiichau yo?

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 이렇게 젖어도 괜찮을까요? 감기 걸릴 텐데…
ko.reading: Ireoke jeojeodo gwaenchaneulkkayo? Gamgi geollil tende...

namecard.description: "Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Beidou

en.title: Good Night
en.text: Time moves quickly. Haha, go, may the wind be at your back.

zh.title: 晚安…
zh.text: 这时间过得可真快。去吧，一帆风顺。
zh.reading: Zhè shíjiān guòdé kě zhēn kuài. Qù ba, yīfānfēngshùn.

ja.title: おやすみ…
ja.text: 時間が過ぎていくのはあっという間だ。ははっ、行ってきな。
ja.reading: Jikan ga sugite iku no wa atto iu ma da. Haha', itte kina.

ko.title: 굿나잇...
ko.text: 벌써 시간이 이렇게 됐네. 하하하하, 가봐~ 편히 쉬라구
ko.reading: Beolsseo sigani ireotge dwaetne. Hahahaha, gabwa~ pyeonhi swiragu.

namecard.description: A sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Bennett

en.title: Favorite Food
en.text: Meat! Meat is the best sustenance there is. Chicken-Mushroom Skewers, Steaks, and Sweet Madames are all my specialties. You won't go hungry if you come adventuring with me, that's for sure!

zh.title: 喜欢的食物…
zh.text: 肉！肉是最能让人精力充沛的食物！野菇鸡肉串，烤肉排，还有甜甜花酿鸡都是我的拿手菜。和我一起冒险，是不会让你饿肚子的。
zh.reading: Ròu! Ròu shì zuì néng ràng rén jīnglì chōngpèi de shíwù! Yěgū Jīròu-chuàn, Kǎoròu-pái, hái yǒu Tiántiánhuā Niàng Jī dōu shì wǒ de náshǒu cài. Hé wǒ yīqǐ màoxiǎn, shì bùhuì ràng nǐ è'dùzi de.

ja.title: 好きな食べ物…
ja.text: 肉だ！肉は一番元気が出る食べ物だよな！キノコ焼き鳥、ステーキ、それと鳥肉のスイートフラワー漬け焼きがオレの得意料理だ。オレと一緒に冒険すれば、腹が空くことはないぞ。

ko.title: 좋아하는 음식…
ko.text: 고기! 고기는 에너지를 가장 많이 채워주는 음식이지! 버섯 닭꼬치, 스테이크, 그리고 달콤달콤 닭고기 스튜! 모두 내가 자신 있는 요리야. 나와 함께 모험하면 절대 굶을 일은 없을 거야
ko.reading: Gogi! Gogineun eneojireul gajang mani chaewojuneun eumsigiji! Beoseot dakkochi, seuteikeu, geurigo dalkomdalkom dakkogi seutyu! Modu naega jasin itneun yoriya. Nawa hamkke moheomhamyeon jeoldae gulmeul ireun eopsseul geoya.

namecard.description: The burning winds of the past ruffle the heron's feathers, but the bird has eyes only for the morning star at first light.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Candace

en.title: In the Desert
en.text: I am right by your side. But if you're still nervous, just take my hand.

zh.title: 在沙漠的时候…
zh.text: 我就在你身旁。若你不放心的话，就请牵着我的手吧。

ja.title: 砂漠にいる時…
ja.text: 私が傍にいます。もし不安だったら、手を繋ぎましょう。
ja.reading: Watashi ga soba ni imasu. Moshi fuan dattara, te wo tsunagimashou.

ko.title: 사막에 있을 때…
ko.text: 내가 곁에 있으니까, 불안하면 내 손을 꼭 잡아
ko.reading: Naega gyeote isseunikka, buranhamyeon nae soneul kkok jaba

namecard.description: "One, I've written an exclusive, and it's going to generate a lot of buzz for sure! Two, the newspaper said the situation is developing too slowly, so they're changing to a press release instead... Three, the person writing the press release will be in the Opera Epiclese as the defendant tomorrow, so they've decided to run my piece after all!"
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Charlotte

en.title: About the Vision
en.text: To be honest... I'd prefer to have an Anemo Vision. Being able to fly around freely would make getting to interviews sooo much easier! A Cryo Vision's not too bad, though. At least I don't need to worry about my Kamera overheating.

zh.title: 关于「神之眼」…
zh.text: 说到这个…其实我更想要一枚「风元素」神之眼的呢。那样的话，也许我就能借助风飞来飞去，轻松地去各地采访了。但这枚「冰元素」的神之眼也不错，至少我不用担心留影机内部机关过热的问题了。

ja.title: 「神の目」について…
ja.text: そうね…実は「風元素」の神の目が欲しかったの。そうしたら、風の力であちこち飛べて、色んな場所に行って取材できるわけでしょ。でも、この「氷元素」の神の目も悪くないわ。少なくとも写真機が熱暴走する心配がなくなったからね。

ko.title: 「신의 눈」에 대해…
ko.text: 실은… 난 「바람 원소」 신의 눈을 갖고 싶었어. 바람의 힘으로 여기저기 날아다니며 인터뷰를 할 수 있으니까. 물론 이 「얼음 원소」 신의 눈도 나쁘지 않아. 덕분에 사진기가 과열될 일은 없거든
ko.reading: Sireun... Nan "Baram wonso" Sinui nuneul gatgo sipeosseo. Baramui himeuro yeogijeogi naradanimyeo inteobyureul hal su isseunikka. Mullon i "Eoreum wonso" Sinui nundo nappeuji ana. Deokbune sajin'giga gwayeoldoel ireun eopgeodeun

namecard.description: Fear not, she's here to make peace, not to fight. The only question is whether to save a few bullets... Y'know, the type that get fired into the sky as warning shots.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chasca

en.title: About the Vision
en.text: This Vision played a major part in my fight against the Abyss. If it hadn't shown up when it did, I don't know who I would be today.

zh.title: 关于「神之眼」…
zh.text: 这枚「神之眼」在我与深渊的对抗中意义重大。如果不是它及时出现，不知道现在的我会是什么样子。

ja.title: 「神の目」について…
ja.text: 私にとってこの「神の目」は、アビスと戦う上でとても意義深いものだ。もしあのタイミングでこれが現れてくれていなければ、今頃どうなっていたことやら…

ko.title: 「신의 눈」에 대해…
ko.text: 이 「신의 눈」은 심연과의 싸움에서 큰 의미를 지녀. 이게 제때 나타나 주지 않았다면, 지금의 나는 대체 어떤 모습일지 짐작도 안 가
ko.reading: I "Sinui nun"-eun simyeon'gwaui ssaumeseo keun uimireul jinyeo. Ige jettae natana juji anatdamyeon, jigeumui naneun daeche eotteon moseubilji jimjakdo an ga

special_dish.name: Sin: The Kind that Doesn't Need to be Dealt With

namecard.description: The standard issue weapon of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol is known as the "Special Security and Surveillance Patrol Type II Standard Musket." Yet, though there may be countless flowers in this world, the one you treasure is special, even if it should be known to the world as nothing at all special.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chevreuse

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: What nice weather! Especially good for keeping an eye on things.

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 天气不错，视野良好。

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: 悪くない天気だな、視界も良好だ。

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 날씨도 좋고, 시야도 좋군
ko.reading: Nalssido joko, siyado jokun

namecard.description: The doll known as "Tamoto-chan" was one of Chiori's earliest works, and is also the model that requires the least fabric and tailoring.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chiori

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: ...This reminds me of home.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: …想起了家乡往日的风景。

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: …故郷の景色を思い出すわ。

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: …고향의 예전 풍경이 떠오르네
ko.reading: ...Gohyang'ui yejeon punggyeong'i tteooreune

namecard.description: This was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chongyun

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Before the resounding thunder, evil must cower in fear.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 这落雷好大阵仗，妖邪也会惧怕的吧。
zh.reading: Zhè luòléi hào dà zhèn zhàng, yāoxié yě huì jùpà de ba.

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: 今の落雷はすごかったな、きっと妖魔も恐れているだろう。
ja.reading: Ima no rakurai wa sugokatta na, kitto youma mo osorete iru darou.

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 이 벼락 기세가 엄청나네. 요마들도 무서워하겠어
ko.reading: I byeorak gisega eomcheongnane. Yomadeuldo museowohagesseo

namecard.description: The black one is akin to obsidian, and is thus called "Itzpapa." The white one is white as a star, and has thus been named "Citlalin."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Citlali

en.title: Chat: Trance
en.text: Going into a trance is risky for most people, so don't get any ideas.

zh.title: 闲聊·出神
zh.text: 「出神仪式」对旁人来说还是挺不稳定的，就不要太好奇了吧。

ja.title: 世間話・脱魂
ja.text: 「脱魂の儀」は一般人にとってちょっと危ないものなの。だから、あんまり興味を持たないようにね。
ja.reading: 「Dakkon no gi」 wa ippanjin ni totte chotto abunai mono na no. Dakara, anmari kyoumi o motanai you ni ne.

ko.title: 잡담·탈혼
ko.text: 일반인에게 「탈혼 의식」은 위험하니까, 너무 관심 가지지 마
ko.reading: Ilbaninege "Talhon uisik"-eun wiheomhanikka, neomu gwansim gajiji ma

namecard.description: Dedicated Game Masters at the Tabletop Troupe will sometimes switch hats to indicate their change in role. Hmm, in that case, does Clorinde—Forget about it! She doesn't even take that hat off when swimming.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Clorinde

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Hopefully, that was the sound of one more villain being removed from the world.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 希望世界上能少个恶徒。

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: この世から、一人でも多くの悪党が消えてくれることを願っている。

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 세상에 악인이 한 명이라도 줄어들었길
ko.reading: Sesang'e agini han myeong'irado jureodeureotgil

namecard.description: "I—It's Cuilein-Anbar! I, uh..."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Collei

en.title: After the Rain
en.text: Even though the rain has stopped, you still need to watch out for puddles. Just like how the past stays in the memory, long after... Ah, ahem, sorry!

zh.title: 雨过天晴…
zh.text: 雨虽然停了，还是要小心水洼。就像一些事，明明过去了还是会留下回忆…咳咳！
zh.reading: Yǔ suīrán tíngle, háishì yào xiǎoxīn shuǐwā. Jiù xiàng yīxiē shì, míngmíng guòqùle háishì huì liúxià huíyì... Kèkè!

ja.title: 雨上がり…
ja.text: 雨は止んだけど、水溜りに気をつけないと。起きてしまったことは、たとえ過ぎ去ったとしても記憶に残ってしまうから——…コホン！
ja.reading: Ame wa yanda kedo, mizutamari ni ki wo tsukenai to. Okite shimatta koto wa, tatoe sugisatta to shite mo kioku ni nokotte shimau kara⸺ ...Kohon!

ko.title: 비가 그친 후…
ko.text: 비는 그쳤지만 물웅덩이를 조심하는 게 좋을 거야. 마치 계속 기억에 남는 과거와도 같으니까… 크흠!
ko.reading: Bineun geuchyeotjiman murungdeong'ireul josimhaneun ge joeul geoya. Machi gyesok gieoge namneun gwageowado gateunikka... Keuheum!

namecard.description: Whenever Cyno falls into a profound silence, he must be considering some weighty judgment... Or perhaps he is simply considering something amusing.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Cyno

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: In some legends, thunderbolts are a form of judgment from the gods above.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 在一些传说中，雷电是神明对人间降下的审判。

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: 一部の伝説によれば、雷は神が俗世に下す審判らしい。
ja.reading: Ichibu no densetsu ni yoreba, kaminari wa kami ga zokusei ni kudasu shinpan rashii.

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 번개는 신이 인간에게 내리는 심판이라는 전설이 있어
ko.reading: Beongaeneun sini inganege naerineun simpaniraneun jeonseol-i isseo

namecard.description: Those that should be burned will be reduced to fly ash, so that all the precious things that should be preserved can be revealed.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Dehya

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Ready to roll? Good. Then let's pack up and move out.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 你看起来精神不错，那我们等会就拔营出发吧。

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: 元気そうじゃないか。だったら、さっさと拠点を発とうぜ。

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 기운이 넘쳐 보이네. 그럼 이따 야영지를 정리하고 출발하자고
ko.reading: Giuni neomchyeo boine. Geureom itta yayeongjireul jeongnihago chulbalhajago

namecard.description: Master Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diluc

en.title: About Us: Proof
en.text: You have already proven your determination. Well then, it is now time for you to witness my resolve.

zh.title: 关于我们・证明
zh.text: 你已经证明了你的决心。那么，也让你见证一下我的意志吧。
zh.reading: Nǐ yǐjīng zhèngmíngle nǐ de juéxīn. Nàme, yě ràng nǐ jiànzhèng yīxià wǒ de yìzhì ba.

ja.title: 証明について…
ja.text: 君はもう自分の決意を証明してくれたよ。じゃあ、今度は僕の意志を見てもらおう。
ja.reading: Kimi wa mou jibun no ketsui wo shoumei shite kureta yo. Jaa, kondo wa boku no ishi wo mite moraou.

ko.title: 우리에 대해・증명
ko.text: 넌 이미 결심을 증명해 보였어, 그럼 이제 내 의지를 증명하지
ko.reading: Neon imi gyeolsimeul jeungmyeonghae boyeosseo, geureom ije nae uijireul jeungmyeonghaji.

namecard.description: All who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diona

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Ahh!!! Uhh, um... I'm not shaking, I'm not... Ohhhh...

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 欸？！…我没有在发抖！没有！…呜…
zh.reading: E?! ...Wǒ méiyǒu zài fādǒu! Méiyǒu! ...Wu...

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: えっ！？…震えてにゃい！ない！…うぅ～…
ja.reading: E'!? ...Furuete nyai! Nai! ...Uu~...

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 어?! …떨고 있는 거 아냐! 아니라니까! 우으…
ko.reading: Eo?! ...Tteolgo inneun geo anya! Aniranikka! Ueu...

namecard.description: If you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Dori

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Oh oh oh! Check out my fully-automatic snowball maker! It's one of a kind! Wanna give it a try? I'll even throw in a 5% discount on the rental!

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 哒啦，看我的全自动雪球机！想要吗想要吗？租金给你打九点五折喔！
zh.reading: Dā lā, kàn wǒ de quánzìdòng xuěqiú-jī! Xiǎngyào ma xiǎngyào ma? Zūjīn gěi nǐ dǎ jiǔdiǎnwǔ zhé ō!

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: じゃじゃーん！全自動雪玉製造マシンですの！どうですどうです？レンタル料を5%引きにしてあげますわよ！
ja.reading: Jajaan! Zenjidou yukidama seizou mashin desu no! Dou desu dou desu? Rentaru-ryou wo go-paasento-biki ni shite agemasu wa yo!

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 자동으로 눈덩이를 만들어 주는 기계야! 갖고 싶지? 5% 할인된 가격에 대여할 수 있어!
ko.reading: Jadong'euro nundeong'ireul mandeureo juneun gigyeya! Gatgo sipji? 5% Harindoen gagyeoge daeyeohal su isseo!

namecard.description: "The top note is sweet, the middle rich but not distracting, and the base — Ah! Such a faint fragrance! Such an exquisite perfume."Orders flow in and out in an endless stream, and to prevent any scents from disturbing her work, Emilie very seldom uses perfume herself. Alas. When will she have the chance to delight in those base notes?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Emilie

en.title: Chat: Newspaper
en.text: Would you mind coming with me to buy a copy of today's newspaper?

zh.title: 闲聊·报纸
zh.text: 若你方便，可以陪我去买一份今天的报纸吗？

ja.title: 世間話·新聞
ja.text: よろしければ、今日の新聞を買いに行くのに付き合っていただけませんか？
ja.reading: Yoroshikereba, kyou no shinbun o kai ni iku no ni tsukiatte itadakemasen ka?

ko.title: 잡담·신문
ko.text: 괜찮다면 오늘 자 신문을 사러 같이 가줄 수 있을까?
ko.reading: Gwaenchantamyeon oneul ja sinmuneul sareo gachi gajul su isseulkka?

namecard.description: For Escoffier, a certain relationship exists between rhythm and flavor. Why, then, does she not fuel her compositions with delicious food? The answer is quite simple — consistent flavors are reliable and comforting, but no one wants to hear the same song over and over.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Escoffier

namecard.description: A cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Eula

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: Visibility is excellent! If we head to higher ground, we can do a full recon of enemy activity in the area.

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 视野不错！登上高地，就能将周围的敌情尽收眼底。
zh.reading: Shìyě bùcuò! Dēng shàng gāodì, jiù néng jiāng zhōuwéi de díqíng jǐn shōu yǎndǐ.

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: 良い眺めね！高い所に登れば、敵の位置が一目瞭然だわ。
ja.reading: Ii nagame ne! Takai tokoro ni noboreba, teki no ichi ga ichimoku ryouzen da wa.

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 시야가 딱 좋네! 높은 곳에 오르면 주변의 적들이 한눈에 다 보이지
ko.reading: Siyaga ttak jotne! Nopeun got'e oreumyeon jubyeon-ui jeokdeuli hannun'e da boiji

namecard.description: "A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Faruzan

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: How beautiful... How awe-inspiring... Achoo! *sniffle* Yes, and very cold-inducing as well...

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 好美…让人着迷…阿嚏！好吧…也让人着凉…

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: なんと美しい…心が奪われるのう…ハクション！うぅ…風邪を引きそうじゃ…
ja.reading: Nanto utsukushii... Kokoro ga ubawareru nou... Hakushon! Uu... Kaze wo hikisou ja...

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 예쁘다… 푹 빠지겠어… 에취! 음… 감기도 걸리겠네…
ko.reading: Yeppeuda... Puk ppajigesseo... Echwi! Eum... Gamgido geolligenne...

namecard.description: A raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Fischl

en.title: Good Morning: Greet Fischl
en.text: Dusk and dawn but fleeting shadows are. Once more, the twists of fate have led you into my everlasting night.

zh.title: 早上好・问候菲谢尔
zh.text: 昼夜时空皆为虚像，命运的纽带却再次将你带到了我的永恒长夜中。
zh.reading: Zhòuyè shíkōng jiē wèi xūxiàng, mìngyùn de niǔdài què zàicì jiāng nǐ dài dàole wǒ de yǒnghéng chángyè zhōng.

ja.title: おはよう・フィッシュルの挨拶
ja.text: 昼夜なんてみんな虚像なのに、運命の絆はあなたを再びわたくしの永夜に連れてきてくれた。
ja.reading: Chuuya nante minna kyozou na no ni, unmei no kizuna wa anata wo futatabi watakushi no eiya ni tsurete kite kureta.
ja.audio: assets/character/voice_overs/Fischl/story/ja/おはよう・フィッシュルの挨拶.mp3

ko.title: 아침 인사・피슬에게
ko.text: 낮과 밤, 시간과 공간은 전부 허상일 뿐. 운명의 유대가 널 다시금 나의 영원한 밤으로 이끌었구나
ko.reading: Natgwa bam, sigangwa gongganeun jeonbu heosang'il ppun. Unmyeong-ui yudaega neol dasigeum naui yeong'wonhan bameuro ikkeureotguna

namecard.description: As the clockwork devices do naught but round and round in circles turn, the dolls march forward.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Freminet

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Don't be scared, Pers. I'll keep you safe.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 佩伊，我会保护你的。不要怕。
zh.reading: Pèiyī, wǒ huì bǎohù nǐ de. Bùyào pà.

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: ペールス、ぼくが守ってあげるから、怖がることはないよ。
ja.reading: Peerusu, boku ga mamotte ageru kara, kowagaru koto wa nai yo.

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 페어, 내가 널 지켜줄게. 무서워하지 마
ko.reading: Peeo, naega neol jikyeojulge. Museowohaji ma

namecard.description: Can one person eat every cake? If they eat one per day, they should be able to enjoy cake for a week or so, right? But will the cakes stay fresh that long? Hmm... Well, don't worry, because there will be friends coming to eat the cakes together.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Furina

en.title: About Us: Our Story Together
en.text: My story has already come to an end, and so the next act shall be about OUR story... In which case, we should probably start charging double for public appearances... Oh, I'm so happy!

zh.title: 关于我们·同行
zh.text: 「我」的故事已然落幕，接下来开场的是「我们」的故事了…这么说的话，出场费是不是也该翻倍啦？好开心哦！

ja.title: 同行について…
ja.text: 「僕」の物語は幕を閉じた。これから上演されるのは「僕たち」の物語だ…ということは、ギャラも二倍になるってことかな？やったぁ！
ja.reading: "Boku" no monogatari wa maku wo tojita. Kore kara jouen areru no wa "boku-tachi" no monogatari da... To iu koto wa, gyara mo nibai mo naru tte koto ka na? Yattaa!

ko.title: 우리에 대해·동행
ko.text: 「내」 이야기는 막을 내렸지만, 이젠 「우리」 이야기가 시작될 차례야… 생각해 보니까 그럼 출연료를 2배로 받을 수 있겠네? 신난다!
ko.reading: "Nae" Iyagineun mageul naeryeotjiman, ijen "Uri" Iyagiga sijakdoel charyeya... Saenggakhae bonikka geureom churyeollyoreul 2-Baero badeul su itgenne? Sinnanda!

namecard.description: "Don't stop believing, Man Chai. One day, we'll soar high, with nary a patched hole in our trousers."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Gaming

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Ahhh... Eh? Why can't I catch any in my mouth?

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 啊——咦？为什么下不到我嘴里的？

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: あーん…ん？なんでオレの口に落ちてこないんだ？

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 아——엥? 왜 입 안으로 안 들어오지?
ko.reading: A⸺Eng? Wae ip aneuro an deureooji?

namecard.description: Do no harm to plant nor insect.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ganyu

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Morning! What's wrong, is there something stuck in my hair? ...Oh. Please don't stare at my h—hairpiece.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 早上好…唔？是哪里没有梳理好吗，请不要盯着我的…盯着我的头饰看。

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: おはようございます…ん？どこか変ですか？あまり…髪飾りをじっと見ないでください。
ja.reading: Ohayou gozaimasu... N? Doko ka hen desu ka? Amari... kamikazari wo jitto minaide kudasai.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 좋은 아침입니다. 어… 제 머리에 헝클어진 곳이라도 있나요? 제 머리 장식을… 그렇게 빤히 보지 말아 주세요
ko.reading: Joeun achimipnida. Eo... je meorie heongkeureojin gosirado innayo? Je meori jangsigeul... geureoke ppanhi boji mara juseyo

namecard.description: As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Gorou

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Whew *shivering*... it's cold. These conditions are unsuitable for outdoor maneuvers.

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 好冷…这种天气不适合露天活动啊…
zh.reading: Hǎo lěng... zhè zhǒng tiānqì bù shìhé lùtiān huódòng a...

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: 寒い…こんな天気の日は野外活動に向いていない…
ja.reading: Samui... Konna tenki no hi wa yagai katsudou ni muite inai...

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 추워… 이런 날씨에 야외활동은 안 하는 게 좋지…
ko.reading: Chuwo... ireon nalssie yaoehwaldong'eun an haneun ge jochi...

namecard.description: Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Hu Tao

en.title: Good Night
en.text: Oh, you sleepy? Get some rest, I'm gonna take a walk by myself...

zh.title: 晚安…
zh.text: 哦，困了吗？那你好好休息，我一个人四处转转。
zh.reading: O, kùnle ma? Nà nǐ hǎohǎo xiūxi, wǒ yīgèrén sìchù zhuànzhuan.

ja.title: おやすみ…
ja.text: 眠いの？じゃあ先に休んで、私はもう少し起きてるから。
ja.reading: Nemui no? Jaa saki ni yasunde, watashi wa mou sukoshi okiteru kara.

ko.title: 굿나잇…
ko.text: 어, 졸려? 그럼 편히 쉬어. 난 혼자 돌아다녀 볼게
ko.reading: Eo, jollyeo? Geureom pyeonhi swieo. Nan honja doradanyeo bolge.

namecard.description: "If you really need to, and you push yourself hard enough, you can even train in your dreams!" Sounds great, but... Is it actually possible?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Iansan

namecard.description: "'Is there any point in getting close to Ifa?' Of course there is, bro, absolutely." "Of course there is, bro, of course there is."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ifa

namecard.description: The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Jean

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Snow. Remember — tend to your boots when we return.

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 下雪了，要注意战靴的保养啊。
zh.reading: Xiàxuěle, yào zhùyì zhànxuē de bǎoyǎng a.

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: 雪だ。ブーツの手入れを念入りにな。
ja.reading: Yuki da. Buutsu no teire wo nen'iri ni na.

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 눈이 오네. 부츠 관리에 신경 써야겠어
ko.reading: Nuni one. Bucheu gwanrie singyeong sseoyagesseo

namecard.description: The upper half of the Turbo Twirly is very stable, but if the lower half gets stuck, there's a high chance you'll end up with one very dizzy rider.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kachina

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Aaah!! Um... I—I'm not scared! I was just... caught off guard!

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 呀——啊…我、我不是害怕，只是被吓了一跳而已。

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: ひぃ——あっ…雷が怖いわけじゃなくよ、びっくりしただけ。
ja.reading: Hii——a'... kaminari ga kowai wake ja naku yo, bikkuri shita dake.

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 꺄악——아… 무, 무서운 게 아니라, 그냥 좀 놀란 것뿐이야
ko.reading: Kkyaak⸺A... Mu, museoun ge anira, geunyang jom nollan geotppuniya

namecard.description: "The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaedehara Kazuha

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: The birdsong at daybreak is nature's gift to us. Let us go. Our journey begins anew.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 清晨的鸟鸣，是大自然的馈赠。启程吧，属于我们的旅途也要开始了。
zh.reading: Qīngchén de niǎo míng, shì dàzìrán de kuìzèng. Qǐchéng ba, shǔyú wǒmen de lǚtú yě yào kāishǐle.

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: 早朝に聞こえる鳥のさえずり、大自然からの恵みでござるな。さあ、参ろう。拙者たちの旅路も始まるでござるよ。
ja.reading: Souchou ni kikoeru tori no saezuri, Daishizen kara no megumi de gozaru na.Saa, mairou. Sessha-tachi no tabiji mo hajimaru de gozaru yo.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 아침의 새소리는 대자연의 선물이지. 출발하자! 우리의 여정도 시작하자고
ko.reading: Achimui saesorineun daejayeonui seonmuriji. Culbalhaja! Uri-ui yeojeongdo sijakhajago.

namecard.description: The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaeya

en.title: When It Snows: Anecdote
en.text: How about a ghost story to go with the snow?

zh.title: 下雪的时候・逸闻
zh.text: 呼…趁着这雪天，跟你讲一个鬼故事吧。
zh.reading: Hū... Chènzhe zhè xuětiān, gēn nǐ jiǎng yīgè guǐ gùshì ba.

ja.title: 雪の日・逸話
ja.text: フフ、せっかくの雪だ。怪談でもしてやろう。
ja.reading: Fufu, sekkaku no yuki da. Kaidan de mo shite yarou.

ko.title: 눈이 올 때・일화
ko.text: 후...눈이 오니 귀신이야기 해줄게
ko.reading: Hu...Nuni oni gwisiniyagi haejulge

namecard.description: Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayaka

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: There's a pleasant breeze and glorious sunshine... So, where shall we go for a walk?
en.audio: assets/character/voice_overs/Kamisato Ayaka/story/en/When the Sun Is Out.mp3

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 风和日丽，要去哪边走走么？
zh.reading: Fēnghé-rìlì, yào qù nǎ biān zǒuzou me?

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: 麗らかな日和です。どこかへ行きませんか？
ja.reading: Uraraka-na hiyori desu. Doko ka he ikimasen ka?

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 포근한 바람, 따스한 햇살. 같이 산책할래요?
ko.reading: Pogeunhan baram, ttaseuhan haessal. Gachi sanchaekhallaeyo?

namecard.description: The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayato

en.title: When It's Windy
en.text: Sometimes, what appears at first to be nothing but a passing breeze can ultimately be that which alters the course of events... Hehe.

zh.title: 起风的时候…
zh.text: 有些「突发情况」，看似细小如微风，却会影响到最终结果…呵呵。
zh.reading: Yǒuxiē "túfā qíngkuàng", kànsì xìxiǎo rú wéifēng, què huì yǐngxiǎng dào zuìzhōng jiéguǒ... hēhē.

ja.title: 風の日…
ja.text: そよ風のように些細な「思いがけないこと」であっても、結果を左右してしまうことがあります…ふふっ。
ja.reading: Soyokaze no you ni sasai-na "omoi ga kenai koto" de atte mo, kekka wo sayuu shite shimau koto ga arimasu... Fufu'.

ko.title: 바람이 불 때…
ko.text: 어떤 「돌발 상황」은 보기엔 사소해 보여도 최종적인 결과에 영향을 줄 수 있죠… 후후
ko.reading: Eotteon "Dolbal sanghwang"-eun bogien sasohae boyeodo choejongjeogin gyeolgwa'e yeonghyang'eul jul su itjyo... Huhu

namecard.description: "When conceptualizing architecture, there is nothing wrong with imagining that the structure we build will surmount the firmament and outlast the stars."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaveh

en.title: Chat: Beauty
en.text: The ability to appreciate beauty is an important virtue.

zh.title: 闲聊·美学
zh.text: 懂得欣赏美是一种好的品德。
zh.reading: Dǒngdé xīnshǎng měi shì yīzhǒng hǎo de pǐndé.

ja.title: 世間話·美学
ja.text: 美の鑑賞というものを理解できるのは、ある種のいい品性だと言えるな。
ja.reading: Bi no kanshou to iu mono wo rikai dekiru no wa, aru shu no ii hinsei da to ieru na.

ko.title: 잡담·미학
ko.text: 아름다움을 감상할 줄 아는 건 일종의 미덕이지
ko.reading: Areumdaumeul gamsanghal jul aneun geon iljong'ui mideogiji

namecard.description: It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Keqing

en.title: Chat: Opportunity
en.text: In adventuring, as in business, you always have to seize the opportunity while it's there.

zh.title: 闲聊・机会
zh.text: 无论是冒险还是做生意，机会都稍纵即逝。
zh.reading: Wúlùn shì màoxiǎn háishì zuò shēngyì, jīhuì dōu shāozòng-jíshì.

ja.title: 世間話・機会
ja.text: 冒険も商売も、チャンスは一瞬なの。
ja.reading: Bouken mo shoubai mo, chansu wa isshun na no.

ko.title: 잡담・기회
ko.text: 모험이든 장사든, 방심했다간 기회는 사라져 버려
ko.reading: Moheomideun jangsadeun, bangismhaetdagan gihoeneun sarajyeo beoryeo

namecard.description: At first glance, you might think that the Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw had finally succeeded in turning the puny Kinich into a vessel of his will. Sadly, though, this is just the way namecards are named.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kinich

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Morning. I'm about to head out, and I won't be back until tomorrow morning. Don't wait up for me.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 早。我正准备出门，天亮前不会回来。不用等我。

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: おはよう。俺はこれから出かける。明日の朝まで帰ってこないから、待たなくていい。

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 안녕, 난 마침 나가려던 참이야. 날 밝기 전까진 안 돌아오니까 기다리지 마
ko.reading: Annyeong, nan machim nagaryeodeon chamiya. Nal balgi jeonkkajin an doraonikka gidariji ma

namecard.description: "To Kirara, the smiles on her customers' faces are the best rewards possible."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kirara

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: The sunlight feels really cozy. Napping in a tree would be nice... Ohh, just the thought of it is making me sleepy.

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 阳光真好啊，要是再有棵树的话…唔，想想都困了…

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: いい陽射しだね。こんな陽射しの上、木でもあったら…ふわぁ、考えただけで眠くなっちゃう…

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 햇볕이 따듯하네. 여기에 나무만 있으면… 으, 상상만 해도 졸려…
ko.reading: Haetbyeochi ttadeuthane. Yeogie namuman isseumyeon... Eu, sangsangman haedo jollyeo...

namecard.description: Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Klee

en.title: Good Afternoon
en.text: Lunchtime! What do you wanna eat today? Let me see if the Teyvat Travel Guide has any suggestions...

zh.title: 中午好…
zh.text: 午饭时间到了！啊…吃什么呢？我来看看《提瓦特游览指南》…
zh.reading: Wǔfàn shíjiān dàole! A... Chī shénme ne? Wǒ lái kànkàn "Tíwǎtè Yóulǎn Zhǐnán"...

ja.title: こんにちは…
ja.text: お昼ごはんの時間だ！なに食べようかな？『テイワット観光ガイド』でも見てみよう…
ja.reading: Ohirugohan no jikan da! Nani tabeyou ka na? "Teiwatto Kankou Gaido" de mo mite miyou...

ko.title: 점심 인사…
ko.text: 점심시간이야! 뭐 먹지? 《티바트 유람 가이드》를 좀 볼까…
ko.reading: Jeomsimsiganiya! Mwo meokji? "Tibateu Yuram Gaideu"reul jom bolkka...

namecard.description: Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kujou Sara

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: The sound of rain masks the enemy's footsteps. Stay alert.

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 雨滴的声音会掩盖脚步声，多加注意吧。

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: 雨の音は足音をかき消してしまう。注意を払っておけ。
ja.reading: Ame no oto wa ashioto wo kakikeshite shimau. Chuui wo haratte oke.

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 빗방울 소리에 발소리가 묻힐 수 있으니 조심해
ko.reading: Bitbang'ul sorie balsoriga muchil su isseuni josimhae

namecard.description: "You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden is truly frightening..."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kuki Shinobu

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: It's a nice day, but I can't seem to shake this strange feeling... Huh, let's just hope it's my imagination.
en.audio: assets/character/voice_overs/Kuki Shinobu/story/en/When the Sun Is Out.mp3

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 嗯，天气真好，但总有种不详的预感…希望是我多虑了吧。
zh.reading: Ng, tiānqì zhēn hǎo, dàn zǒng yǒu zhǒng bùxiáng de yùgǎn... Xīwàng shì wǒ duōlǜle ba.

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: いい天気だ。ただ、どうも嫌な予感がする…私の考えすぎだといいけど。
ja.reading: Ii tenki da. Tada, dou mo kirai-na yokan ga suru... Watashi no kangaesugi da to ii kedo.

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 날씨는 좋은데 어쩐지 불길한 예감이 들어…. 괜한 걱정이었으면 좋겠군
ko.reading: Nalssineun joeunde eojjeonji bulgilhan yegami deureo... Gwaenhan geokjeong'ieosseumyeon joketgun.

namecard.description: The swallow's arrival shall bring forth cleansing rains, washing the worries of wizened winter away.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lan Yan

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: Look! Everything the sun touches is coated in gold!
en.audio: assets/character/voice_overs/Lan Yan/story/en/When the Sun Is Out.mp3

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 看，阳光扫到的地方都镀上了一层金欸

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: 見て、光が当たったところ…まるで金箔を貼ったみたい。

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 봐, 햇살이 닿은 곳에 전부 금박이 칠해졌어
ko.reading: Bwa, haetsari daeun gose jeonbu geumbagi chilhaejyeosseo

namecard.description: "The starry sky in your dreams will illuminate your way forward, on the premise that the crystal in your heart reflects clear lights."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Layla

en.title: In the Desert
en.text: Scorching hot days and freezing cold nights... I—I don't think I'm gonna make it...

zh.title: 在沙漠的时候…
zh.text: 白天晒，晚上冷，我、我要不行了。

ja.title: 砂漠にいる時…
ja.text: 昼は暑くて、夜は寒い…私、もうダメかも。
ja.reading: Hiru wa atsukute, yoru wa samui... Watashi, mou dame ka mo.

ko.title: 사막에 있을 때…
ko.text: 낮은 뜨겁고, 밤은 추워서 버, 버틸 수가 없어요
ko.reading: Najeun tteugeopgo, bameun chuwoseo beo, beotil suga eopseoyo

namecard.description: An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lisa

en.title: When It's Windy
en.text: Such a calming breeze... Perfect for taking a nap, don't you think?

zh.title: 起风的时候…
zh.text: 天气真好，能躺下来补个觉就更好了。
zh.reading: Tiānqì zhēn hǎo, néng tǎngxiàlái bǔ gè jiào jiù gèng hǎole.

ja.title: 風の日…
ja.text: 本当にいい天気。横になってお昼寝したらもっと最高ね。
ja.reading: Hontou ni ii tenki. Yoko ni natte ohirune shitara motto saikou ne.

ko.title: 바람이 불 때…
ko.text: 날씨 참 좋네. 누워서 잠을 보충할 수 있다면 더 좋을 텐데
ko.reading: Nalssi cham jonne. Nuwoseo jameul bochunghal su itdamyeon deo joeul tende

namecard.description: One major type of magic revolves around "appearing suddenly." Lynette is usually conserving her energy, but her serious side can "appear" as abruptly as pigeons from a hat.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lynette

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Ow... that hurts my ears.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 唔…耳朵疼。

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: あぅ…耳が痛い。

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 윽… 귀가 아파
ko.reading: Euk... Gwiga apa

namecard.description: One major type of magic revolves around making things "vanish." Lyney has an arsenal of tricks up his sleeve. As his accomplice, as long as you are willing to turn a blind eye, all your problems may vanish as well.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lyney

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: ...C'mon, just five more minutes... Huh? Oh! It's you! I thought it was the radiance of the sunlight on my skin that I felt — turns out it was your radiance all along!

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: …唔，再让我睡会儿…嗯？是你呀——嗯，我说怎么今天的阳光那么好，原来是你来了。

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: …うぅ～ん、もう少し寝かせて…ん？君だったんだ——うん、どうりでこんなに天気がいいわけだ。なんたって、君が来たんだから。
ja.reading: ...Uu~n, mou sukoshi nekasete... N? Kimi datta nda—— Un, douri de konna ni tenki ga ii wake da. Nantatte, kimi ga kita ndakara.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: …음, 나 좀 더 잘래…. 응? 너구나? 응, 오늘 햇빛이 왜 이렇게 좋나 했더니, 네가 와서 그렇구나
ko.reading: ...Eum, na jom deo jallae.... Eung? Neoguna? Eung, oneul haetbichi wae ireoke jonna haetdeoni, nega waseo geureokuna

namecard.description: No Pyro Archon has ever intended to contest the sun. But as ordinary people see it, this "solar ring" is the crown of leaders as radiant as the sun.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mavuika

en.title: Chat: Light
en.text: Many insects have a compulsion to follow the light, and humans are the same — except we call that light, "hope."

zh.title: 闲聊·循光
zh.text: 许多昆虫有循光而行的本能，人类也是如此，只是我们称那道光为「希望」。

ja.title: 世間話・光を追う
ja.text: 昆虫は本能的に光を追うが、人間も同じだ。「希望」という名の光を追っている。

ko.title: 잡담·빛을 따라
ko.text: 곤충은 대개 빛을 따라 움직이는 본능이 있어. 인간도 마찬가지야. 다만 우리는 그 빛을 「희망」이라고 부르지
ko.reading: Gonchung'eun daegae bicheul ttara umjigineun bonneung'i isseo. In'gando machan'gajiya. Daman urineun geu bicheul "Huimang"-irago bureuji

namecard.description: Every time he holds the map he illustrated in his hands, the boy feels like he is holding a small piece of rubbing of this world.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mika

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Thunder can mask the sound of movement, which is why it's our friend.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 雷声可以掩盖行动的声响，是我们的好朋友。
zh.reading: Léishēng kěyǐ yǎngài xíngdòng de shēngxiǎng, shì wǒmen de hǎopéngyǒu.

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: 雷は、行動の際に生じる音をかき消してくれます。僕たちの仲間と言ってもいいでしょう…
ja.reading: Kaminari wa, koudou no sai ni shoujiru oto wo kakikeshite kuremasu. Boku-tachi no nakama to itte mo ii deshou...

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 천둥소리는 기척을 감춰주니, 우리의 좋은 친구라고 할 수 있죠
ko.reading: Cheondungsorineun gicheogeul gamchwojuni, uriui joeun chin'gurago hal su itjyo

namecard.description: A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mona

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Your arrival is untimely. The morning star has just waned... Breakfast? No, I—I've already eaten.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 你来得不巧，清晨的启明星刚刚消失了…早餐？我，我已经吃过了。
zh.reading: Nǐ lái dé bùqiǎo, qīngchén de qǐmíngxīng gānggāng xiāoshīle... Zǎocān? Wǒ, wǒ yǐjīng chīguòle.

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: タイミングが悪かったですね、明けの明星はついさっき消えたばかり…朝食？も、もう食べましたよ。
ja.reading: Taimingu ga warukatta desu ne, ake no myoujou wa tsui sakki kieta bakari... Choushoku? Mo, mou tabemashita yo.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 타이밍이 안 좋네, 새벽의 계명성이 방금 막 사라졌거든…. 아침밥? 버, 벌써 먹었지
ko.reading: Taiming'i an jonne, saebyeogui gyemyeongseong'i banggeum mak sarajyeotgeodeun.... Achimbap? Beo, beolsseo meogeotji

namecard.description: Sharks that live in the sea don't actually like eating people — they prefer marine creatures. So as a shark that lives in freshwater hot springs, it's only natural that Mualani's Sharky Surfboard will only eat hot spring creatures. ...Just kidding, those Capybaras can sleep easy. Firstly, because their meat's too tough. And secondly, because... it's a surfboard?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mualani

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Whoa! Did you see that? Where did it strike!?

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 哇哦！劈哪了劈哪了？

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: わあ！どこに落ちた？

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 우와! 번개야? 번개 쳤어?
ko.reading: Uwa! Beon'gaeya? Beon'gae chyeosseo?

namecard.description: The rising moon admires the sun, because her light can shine all over the earth. On the other hand, the setting sun is envious of the moon, for she can be accompanied by the sweetest of dreams.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nahida

en.title: About Nahida: Knowledge
en.text: Oh, the Mare Jivari? A place without anything at all, completely empty — just like a Shroomboar's brain. Of course I know it. ...Hmm? I, uh... It's true, I've never seen it with my own eyes. It's one of the many places beyond my reach.

zh.title: 关于纳西妲自己・见识
zh.text: 烬寂海啊，那里什么都没有，就像蕈猪的脑子一样空空如也，我当然知道。啊？我…我确实没有亲眼见过，那也是我所触及不到的地方呀。
zh.reading: Jìnjì-hǎi a, nàlǐ shénme dōu méiyǒu, jiù xiàng Xùn-zhū de nǎozi yīyàng kōngkōngrúyě, wǒ dāngrán zhīdào. A? Wǒ... Wǒ quèshí méiyǒu qīnyǎn jiànguò, nà yěshì wǒ suǒ chùjí bù dào de dìfāng ya.

ja.title: ナヒーダ自身について・見識
ja.text: 烬寂海？あそこには何もないわ。キノシシの脳みそみたいに空っぽ。もちろん知っているわよ。えっ？た…確かに直接見たことがあるわけじゃない…だってあそこも、私には手の届かない場所だもの。
ja.audio: assets/character/voice_overs/Nahida/story/ja/ナヒーダ自身について・見識.mp3

ko.title: 나히다 자신에 대해・견문
ko.text: 잿더미 바다라. 당연히 알지, 거기엔 아무것도 없어. 텅텅 빈 버섯 돼지 머릿속처럼 말이야. 응? 내… 내가 직접 가본 적은 없어. 거기는 내가 닿을 수 없는 곳이니까
ko.reading: Jaetdeomi badara. Dang'yeonhi alji, geogien amugeotdo eopseo. Teongteong bin beoseot dwaeji meoritsokcheoreom mariya. Eung? Nae... Naega jikjeop gabon jeogeun eopseo. Geogineun naega daeul su eomneun gosinikka

namecard.description: Roses shall bloom, and thus does Ms. Navia's umbrella flower. Yet beware, for roses have thorns, and Navia's booming brolly packs a powerful punch.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Navia

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: Quick, look! Up in the sky! Look at that scorching sun, it's like a blast furnace! You know what this means? It means we have to drop everything, right now, and make a run for the ice cream store! We need to get two of the biggest cones they sell, and then it's an all-out race to see who can finish before it melts!

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 就是现在，立刻，马上，抬头！你看天上，是不是烈日炎炎，骄阳似火！知道这说明什么吗？说明我们现在应当立刻，马上，去买最大号的超级冰冰凉甜筒，然后比赛谁能在它融化前全部吃完！
zh.reading: Jiùshì xiànzài, lìkè, mǎshàng, táitóu! Nǐ kàn tiān shàng, shìbushì lièrìyányán, jiāoyángsìhuǒ! Zhīdào zhè shuōmíng shénme ma? Shuōmíng wǒmen xiànzài yīngdāng lìkè, mǎshàng, qù mǎi zuìdà hào de chāojí bīngbīngliáng tiántǒng, ránhòu bǐsài shéi néng zài tā rónghuà qián quánbù chī wán!

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: ねえねえほらほら！見て！上！空のお日様が、炎みたいに明るいでしょ！これが何を意味してるか分かる？そう…今すぐ一緒に一番大きいサイズのウルトラアイスクリームを買ってきて、どっちが溶ける前に食べ切れるか勝負するの！
ja.reading: Nee nee hora hora! Mite! Ue! Sora no ohi-sama, honoo mitai ni akarui desho! Kore ga nani wo imi shiteru ka wakaru?Sou... Ima sugu issho ni ichiban ookii saizu no urutora aisukuriimu wo katte kite, docchi ga tokeru mae ni tabekireru ga shoubu suru no!

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 지금이야! 어서 고개를 들어봐! 불덩이처럼 뜨겁게 타오르는 태양이 보이지? 저게 뭘 의미하는지 알아?지금 당장 가장 큰 사이즈의 아이스크림을 사서 누가 가장 빨리 먹어 치우는지 시합하라는 계시라고!
ko.reading: Jigeumiya! Eoseo gogaereul deureobwa! Buldeong'icheoreom tteugeopge taoreuneun taeyang'i boiji? Jeoge mwol uimihaneunji ara?Jigeum dangjang gajang keun saijeuui aiseukeurimeul saseo nuga gajang ppalli meogeo chiuneunji sihapharaneun gyesirago!

namecard.description: The water's surface may seem placid as a pristine gem, but it may yet be lying in wait for an opportune moment to gush forth.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Neuvillette

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Good morning. I hope you have a wonderful day.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 早上好。希望你今天过得愉快。
zh.reading: Zǎoshang hǎo. Xīwàng nǐ jīntiānguò dé yúkuài.

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: おはよう。善き一日になることを祈る。

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 좋은 아침입니다. 즐거운 하루 보내시길 바랍니다
ko.reading: Joeun achimimnida. Jeulgeoun haru bonaesigil baramnida

namecard.description: The lotus that blooms amidst the pure water is naught but a flash of light beneath her toes.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nilou

en.title: Chat: Rest
en.text: Relaxing days like this are nice... Let's take it easy.

zh.title: 闲聊・休息
zh.text: 这样清闲的日子倒也不错嘛，优哉游哉。
zh.reading: Zhèyàng qīngxián de rìzi dào yě bùcuò ma, yōuzāi-yóuzāi.

ja.title: 世間話・休み
ja.text: こういう穏やかな日も悪くないよね…のんびりしよ～っと。
ja.reading: Kou iu odayaka na hi mo warukunai yo ne... Nonbiri shiyo~tto.

ko.title: 잡담・휴식
ko.text: 이렇게 여유로운 날도 나쁘지 않아, 정말 한가하네
ko.reading: Ireoke yeoyuroun naldo nappeuji ana, jeongmal han'gahane

namecard.description: They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ningguang

en.title: Chat: Trade War
en.text: In a trade war, the perfect hunter leaves no trace.

zh.title: 闲聊・商战
zh.text: 在商战中，完美的猎手不会留下任何痕迹。
zh.reading: Zài shāngzhàn zhōng, wánměi de lièshǒu bùhuì liúxià rènhé hénjī.

ja.title: 世間話・商戦
ja.text: 商戦の中で、完璧な狩人は痕跡を残さないわ。
ja.reading: Shousen no naka de, kanpeki-na karyuudo wa konseki wo nokosanai wa.

ko.title: 잡담・상업 전쟁
ko.text: 상업 전쟁에서 완벽한 사냥꾼은 흔적을 남기지 않아
ko.reading: Sang'eop jeonjaeng'eseo wanbyeokhan sanyangkkuneun heunjeogeul namgiji ana

namecard.description: Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Noelle

en.title: Good Afternoon
en.text: Ready for your tea break? Please wait here while I get it ready. Oh yes, I also made Lighter-Than-Air Pancakes! You simply must try one, it's my specialty.

zh.title: 中午好…
zh.text: 想要坐下来喝杯茶吗？我去为你准备。对了，我还顺手准备了厚云朵松饼，是我的拿手菜哦，请一定要尝一尝。
zh.reading: Xiǎngyào zuòxiàlái hē bēi chá ma? Wǒ qù wèi nǐ zhǔnbèi. Duìle, wǒ hái shùnshǒu zhǔnbèile Hòuyúnduǒ Sōngbǐng, shì wǒ de náshǒucài o, qǐng yīdìng yào chángyicháng.

ja.title: こんにちは…
ja.text: 座ってお茶でもしますか？すぐにご用意しますね。そうだ、ついでにパンケーキもご用意します。得意料理ですので、ぜひ召し上がってください。

ko.title: 점심 인사…
ko.text: 앉아서 차 한잔 하실래요? 제가 준비해드릴게요. 맞다, 하는 김에 장원 팬케이크도 만들어 봤어요. 자신 있는 요리니 꼭 드셔보세요
ko.reading: Anjaseo cha hanjan hasillaeyo? Jega junbihaedeurilgeyo. Matda, haneun gime jang'won paenkeikeudo mandeureo bwasseoyo. Jasin inneun yorini kkok deusyeoboseyo

namecard.description: Just as starlight cannot overpower the darkness of night, so too do shadows linger beneath the candle's light. Likewise, the heart's emptiness cannot easily be filled.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ororon

en.title: Chat: Smoke
en.text: Sometimes, a shrouded path is not meant to be walked. Move forward with blind ambition, and the smoke might suffocate you.

zh.title: 闲聊·迷烟
zh.text: 不是所有的迷烟都能穿过。如果野心太大，就会被烟雾呛到。

ja.title: 世間話・迷煙
ja.text: すべての「迷煙」を通り抜けられるとは限らない。欲張りすぎると、かえって煙にむせてしまうことになる。

ko.title: 잡담·연기
ko.text: 모든 연기를 다 통과할 수 있는 건 아니야. 야망이 과하게 크면, 연기에 질식할 수도 있어
ko.reading: Modeun yeon'gireul da tonggwahal su inneun geon aniya. Yamang'i gwahage keumyeon, yeon'gie jilsikhal sudo isseo

namecard.description: What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Qiqi

en.title: Chat: Afraid of Heat
en.text: Let's go somewhere cooler.

zh.title: 闲聊・怕热
zh.text: 想去凉快点的地方。
zh.reading: Xiǎng qù liángkuai diǎn dì dìfāng.

ja.title: 世間話・暑さが苦手
ja.text: 涼しい場所に行きたい。
ja.reading: Suzushii basho ni ikitai.

ko.title: 잡담・더위에 약함
ko.text: 시원한 곳으로 가고 싶어
ko.reading: Siwonhan goseuro gago sipeo

namecard.description: Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with the Raiden Shogun

en.title: Chat: Idleness
en.text: Inactivity serves no purpose whatsoever. Hmph.

zh.title: 闲聊・徒然
zh.text: 徒然无事，对砚枯坐。哼。
zh.reading: Túrán wú shì, duì yàn kū zuò. Ng.

ja.title: 世間話・徒然
ja.text: つれづれなるままに、日くらし、硯にむかひて。ふん。
ja.reading: Tsuredzure naru mama ni, hikurashi, suzuri ni mukahite. Fun.

ko.title: 잡담・공연함
ko.text: 할 일도 없이 괜히 벼루만 쳐다보고 있네, 흠
ko.reading: Hal ildo eopssi gwaenhi byeoruman chyeodabogo inne, heum

namecard.description: It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Razor

en.title: Something to Share
en.text: I like the stars at night. So many stars. In the sky, in the lake. And in the city.

zh.title: 有什么想要分享…
zh.text: 晚上，星星很好看。天空，湖里，都有很多很多星星。晚上，城市里，也有很多星星。
zh.reading: Wǎnshang, xīngxing hěn hǎokàn. Tiānkōng, húlǐ, dōu yòu hěnduō hěnduō xīngxing.Wǎnshang, chéngshì lǐ, yě yǒu hěnduō xīngxing.

ja.title: シェアしたいこと…
ja.text: 夜、星きれい。空、湖、どこも星いっぱい。夜、街の中も、星いっぱい。
ja.reading: Yoru, hoshi kirei. Sora, mizuumi, doko mo hoshi-ippai.Yoru, machi no naka mo, hoshi-ippai.

ko.title: 하고 싶은 이야기…
ko.text: 밤하늘의 별들은 정말 아름다워. 하늘뿐만 아니라 호수에도 별들이 가득 차있어.밤에는 도시에도 많은 별들이 있어
ko.reading: Bamhaneurui byeoldeureun jeongmal areumdawo. Haneulppunman anira hosuedo byeoldeuri gadeuk chaisseo.Bameneun dosiedo maneun byeoldeuri isseo.

namecard.description: The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Rosaria

en.title: Chat: Overtime
en.text: Everything is negotiable, except overtime.

zh.title: 闲聊・加班
zh.text: 什么都可以商量，除了加班。
zh.reading: Shénme dōu kéyǐ shāngliáng, chúle jiābān.

ja.title: 世間話・残業
ja.text: なんでもいいわ、残業以外ならね。
ja.reading: Nan demo ii wa, zangyou igai nara ne.

ko.title: 잡담・잔업
ko.text: 뭐든 말 해봐. 잔업은 빼고
ko.reading: Mwodeun mal haebwa. Janeobeun ppaego

namecard.description: All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sangonomiya Kokomi

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: The snow... have you ever seen such beauty?

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 雪…真漂亮呀。
zh.reading: Xuě... zhēn piàoliàng ya.

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: 雪…とても綺麗ですね。
ja.reading: Yuki... Totemo kirei desu ne.

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 눈… 정말 아름답다
ko.reading: Nun... Jeongmal areumdapda

namecard.description: It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sayu

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: Eek, let's find shelter, quick! Watering works on plants, but not people...

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 快躲雨，被雨淋到就长不高了。

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: はやく雨宿りを。雨に打たれると背が伸びなくなる！
ja.reading: Hayaku amayadori wo. Ame ni utareru to se ga nobinaku naru!

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 비를 피해야 해. 비 맞으면 키 안 커!
ko.reading: Bireul pihaeya hae. Bi majeumyeon ki an keo!

namecard.description: Each Ba Fragment has its unique symbol. While this one resembles an hourglass, it represents King Deshret's rule over both Upper and Lower Setekh. As for the light within, it stands for the wisdom of Hermanubis.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sethos

en.title: When the Sun Is Out
en.text: The weather's so perfect, it would be such a waste not to go camping. How does fishing in an oasis sound?

zh.title: 阳光很好…
zh.text: 天气真好，不找个地方露营可就太浪费了。走吗，一起去绿洲钓鱼？

ja.title: 晴れの日…
ja.text: こんないい天気に、キャンプしないなんてもったいなすぎるだろ？オアシスに釣りに行かないか？

ko.title: 햇살이 좋을 때…
ko.text: 날이 참 좋네. 이런 날엔 캠핑 안 가면 섭하지. 오아시스에 같이 낚시하러 안 갈래?
ko.reading: Nari cham jonne. Ireon naren kaemping an gamyeon seophaji. Oasiseue gachi naksihareo an gallae?

namecard.description: The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shenhe

en.title: After the Rain
en.text: The sky is clearing up, and so is my mood. I just hope no one shows up to bother me... if they do, I'll just make them disappear.

zh.title: 雨过天晴…
zh.text: 天气变好，我也很开心。只希望没有人来打扰…如果有，就让他们消失好了。

ja.title: 雨上がり…
ja.text: 天気が良くなると、気分も晴れる。邪魔者が来ないのを願おう…たとえ来たとしても、消えてもらうのみだが。
ja.reading: Tenki ga yoku naru to, kibun mo hareru. Jamamono ga konai no wo negaou... Tatoe kita to shite mo, kiete morau no mi da ga.

ko.title: 비가 그친 후…
ko.text: 날씨가 좋아지니 나도 기분이 좋군. 아무도 방해하지 않았으면 해…. 방해하는 자가 있다면 전부 없애주지
ko.reading: Nalssiga joajini nado gibuni jokun. Amudo banghaehaji anatseumyoen hae.... Banghaehaneun jaga ittamyeon jeonbu eopsaejuji.

namecard.description: A Temari of entwining strings in various colors. It must have taken someone's great effort to make such an item, yet Heizou only sees it as a simple game to untangle each string.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shikanoin Heizou

en.title: Good Afternoon
en.text: Alright. Now that lunch is over, whaddya say we play a game to keep our minds sharp? Relay Stones? Hehe... okay, I guess we can warm up with that.

zh.title: 中午好…
zh.text: 吃饱了玩点锻炼脑力的游戏吧！继电石？哈哈，这个只能锻炼心态吧。
zh.reading: Chībǎole wán diǎn duànliàn nǎolì de yóuxì ba! Jìdiàn-shí? Haha, zhège zhǐ néng duànliàn xīntài ba.

ja.title: こんにちは…
ja.text: お腹いっぱいになったんだったら、脳鍛練でもしようよ！継電石？あはは、あんなのは精神しか鍛えられないよ。

ko.title: 점심 인사…
ko.text: 배불리 먹었으니까 두뇌게임을 좀 해볼까? 계전석? 하하, 그건 정신 단련밖에 못 하잖아
ko.reading: Baebulli meogeosseunikka dunoegeimeul jom haebolkka? Gyejeonseok? Haha, geugeon jeongsin dallyeonbakke mot hajana

namecard.description: Sigewinne will take good care of her patients. Don't worry, her injections aren't that painful — and while the medicines aren't very tasty, you'd take them over the barren wasteland that special blend milkshakes represent.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sigewinne

en.title: Chat: Stickers
en.text: No... I didn't put a sticker on your back.

zh.title: 闲聊·贴纸
zh.text: 没有哦，我没有在你背后贴贴纸。

ja.title: 世間話·ステッカー
ja.text: 安心して、キミの背中にステッカーは貼ってないから。

ko.title: 잡담·스티커
ko.text: 아니야, 나 네 등에 스티커 안 붙였어
ko.reading: Aniya, na ne deung'e seutikeo an buchyeosseo

namecard.description: If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sucrose

en.title: Chat: Deep Breaths
en.text: Ahhh! I haven't been out in a while.

zh.title: 闲聊・深呼吸
zh.text: 嗯——！好久没出来透气了。
zh.reading: Ng⸺! Hǎojiǔ méi chūlái tòuqìle.

ja.title: 世間話・深呼吸
ja.text: うん——！外の空気は久々。
ja.reading: Un⸺! Soto no kuuki wa hisabisa.

ko.title: 잡담・심호흡
ko.text: 휴——! 바람 쐬러 나온 것도 오랜만이네
ko.reading: Hyu⸺! Baram ssoereo naon geotdo oraenmanine

namecard.description: This bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tartaglia

en.title: When It Snows: Foreign Country
en.text: Haha, ahh... could it be snowing in Snezhnaya too?

zh.title: 下雪的时候・异国
zh.text: 哈哈哈，不知老家那边，是否也在下雪？
zh.reading: Hahaha, bùzhī lǎojiā nàbiān, shìfǒu yě zài xiàxuě?

ja.title: 雪の日・異国
ja.text: ハハッ、故郷の方でも今は雪が降っているのかな？
ja.reading: Haha', kokyou no hou de mo ima wa yuki ga futte iru no ka na?

ko.title: 눈이 올 때・이국
ko.text: 하하, 내 고향에도 눈이 내리고 있으려나?
ko.reading: Haha, nae gohyang'edo nuni naerigo isseuryeona?

namecard.description: Blazing armor, flaming guards.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Thoma

en.title: Chat: Thoma's Treat
en.text: Hey... how about we go for a nice meal some time? My treat, of course.

zh.title: 闲聊・请客
zh.text: 嗯…找个时间一起吃顿好的怎么样，我请客。
zh.reading: Ǹg... Zhǎo gè shíjiān yīqǐ chī dùn hǎo de zěnmeyàng, wǒ qǐngkè.

ja.title: 世間話・奢り
ja.text: ふむ…今度一緒に美味しいものを食べに行かないか。オレの奢りだ。
ja.reading: Fumu... Kondo issho ni oishii mono wo tabe ni ikanai ka. Ore no okori da.

ko.title: 잡담・초대
ko.text: 음… 언제 한번 같이 좋은 거 먹으러 갈까? 내가 살게
ko.reading: Eum... Eonje hangeon gachi joeun geo meogeureo galkka? Naega salge.

namecard.description: Tighnari takes good care of his big, fluffy tail. The essential oil he uses was extracted from flowers and mixed together meticulously. It gives off a faint, calming scent.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tighnari

en.title: Good Morning
en.text: Shh, listen! That's the sound of dew dripping upon the leaves.

zh.title: 早上好…
zh.text: 听！是晨露滴落叶梢的声音。
zh.reading: Tīng! Shì chénlù dīluò yèshāo de shēngyīn.

ja.title: おはよう…
ja.text: ほら、葉先から滴り落ちる朝露の音が聞こえるよ。
ja.reading: Hora, yousen kara shitatariochiru asatsuyu no oto ga kikoeru yo.

ko.title: 아침 인사…
ko.text: 들어봐! 아침이슬이 나뭇잎에 떨어지는 소리야
ko.reading: Deureobwa! Achimiseuri namutipe tteoreojineun soriya.

namecard.description: What could possibly be the secret to her immense strength? D'you think it's got something to do with her nigh-on insatiable appetite...?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Varesa

namecard.description: The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Venti

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: Let's go jumping in puddles and see who can make the biggest splash!

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 来踩小水坑吧！看看谁溅出来的水花更大！
zh.reading: Lái cǎi xiǎoshuǐkēng ba! Kànkan shéi jiànchūlái de shuǐhuā gèng dà!

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: 水たまりを踏んでみよう！どっちが大きな水しぶきを飛ばせるかな！
ja.reading: Mizutamari wo funde miyou! Docchi ga ookina mizushibuki wo tobaseru ka na!

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 와서 물웅덩이를 밟아봐! 누가 물보라를 더 크게 일으키나 보자고!
ko.reading: Waseo murungdeong'ireul balbabwa! Nuga mulborareul deo keuge ireukina bojago!

namecard.description: In a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of floating flowers does thin snow abide.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Wanderer

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Huh. How irritating.

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 啧…烦心。
zh.reading: Zé... fánxīn.

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: チッ…煩わしい。
ja.reading: Chi'... Wazurawashii.

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 칫… 짜증 나네
ko.reading: Chit... jjajeung nane

namecard.description: Maintaining order at the Fortress of Meropide is no simple affair. As such, a deft and sometimes firm hand is needed — along with a small pinch of truly regrettable cruelty.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Wriothesley

en.title: Chat: Stickers
en.text: If you ever see any stickers on my back, do me a favor and take them off... Melusines like to play pranks sometimes.

zh.title: 闲聊·贴纸
zh.text: 如果看到我背后粘着美露莘画的贴纸，帮我揭掉吧？

ja.title: 世間話·ステッカー
ja.text: 俺の背中にメリュジーヌが描いたステッカーが貼ってあったら、剥がしてくれるかい？
ja.reading: Ore no senaka ni Meryujiinu ga kaita sutekkaa ga hatte attara, hagashite kureru kai?

ko.title: 잡담·스티커
ko.text: 혹시 내 등에 멜뤼진이 그린 스티커가 붙어있으면 꼭 떼어줘
ko.reading: Hoksi nae deung'e mellwijini geurin seutikeoga buteoisseumyeon kkok tteeojwo

namecard.description: Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiangling

en.title: When It's Windy
en.text: Anemo Slimes always come out in this weather. If you catch some, I'll make you a Slime Slushie!

zh.title: 起风的时候…
zh.text: 风史莱姆最喜欢在这种天气活动，快趁机多收集点儿！我给你做史莱姆沙冰！

ja.title: 風の日…
ja.text: 風スライムはこういう天気の時に動くのが好きなんだよ。せっかくだからたくさん集めてね！スライムかき氷作ってあげるから！
ja.reading: Kaze Suraimu wa kou iu tenki no toki ni ugoku no ga suki nan da yo. Sekkaku da kara takusan atsumete ne! Suraimu kakigoori tsukutte ageru kara!

ko.title: 바람이 불 때…
ko.text: 슬라임은 이런 날씨를 가장 좋아해. 그러니 이 틈에 왕창 잡자! 내가 슬라임 빙수 해줄게!
ko.reading: Seullaimeun ireon nalssireul gajang joahae. Geureoni i teume wangchang japja! Naega seullaim bingsu haejulge!

namecard.description: Those who the truth tell, commuted shall their sentence be. Be honest. When Cloud Retainer asked you, "Do you perceive one as merely some larger bird?", did you also append the thoughts, "Yes, and you talk, and fiddle with funny machines"?
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xianyun

en.title: Good Afternoon
en.text: Hmm? Spare me that look, is it not your turn to prepare luncheon today?

zh.title: 中午好…
zh.text: 嗯？看本仙做什么，今天不是轮到你准备午饭了吗？

ja.title: こんにちは…
ja.text: ふむ？妾をじっと見てどうした。今日の昼餉はお前が作る番だろう？

ko.title: 점심 인사…
ko.text: 응? 왜 날 보는 것이냐? 오늘은 네가 점심 식사 당번 아니었나?
ko.reading: Eung? Wae nal boneun geosinya? Oneureun nega jeomsim siksa dangbeon anieonna?

namecard.description: He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiao

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Once the snow is thick enough, we can eat it.

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 雪积起来之后，就可以挖着吃了。
zh.reading: Xuě jīqǐlái zhīhòu, jiù kěyǐ wāzhe chīle.

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: 雪が積もったら、それを握って食えるな…
ja.reading: Yuki ga tsumottara, sore wo nigitte kueru na...

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 눈이 쌓이고 나면, 파먹을 수 있어
ko.reading: Nuni ssaigo namyeon, pameogeul su isseo

namecard.description: Right on cue, the mountains echo with the rhythm of Xilonen's forge-hammer. When the final echo fades, she has already long ceased her toil and found a sunlit spot for her afternoon nap.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xilonen

voice_actors.actor: Fairouz Ai (ファイルーズ あい)

en.title: Chat: Potted Plant
en.text: *sigh* My potted plant on the porch has died again. I was watering it every day... Don't tell me I overdid it this time?

zh.title: 闲聊·绿植
zh.text: 唉，阳台上的那盆花又枯了，我明明每天都给它浇水…难道这次是浇太多了？

ja.title: 世間話・植物
ja.text: あちゃー、ベランダの花がまた枯れてる。毎日水やりしてるのに…もしかして、逆にやり過ぎ？

ko.title: 잡담·녹색 식물
ko.text: 하아, 베란다에 있는 화분이 또 시들었어. 분명 매일 물을 줬는데… 설마 물을 너무 자주 줬나?
ko.reading: Haa, beranda'e inneun hwabuni tto sideureosseo. Bunmyeong maeil mureul jwonneunde... Seolma mureul neomu jaju jwonna?

namecard.description: Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xingqiu

en.title: Chat: Taking a Break
en.text: Now this is what I call, "a moment of solitude."

zh.title: 闲聊・偷闲
zh.text: 正所谓「偷得浮生半日闲」，哈哈。
zh.reading: Zhèng suǒwèi "tōu dé fúshēng bànrì xián", hāhā.

ja.title: 世間話・暇を得る
ja.text: 「儚い人生の中で一瞬の暇を得た」というやつだ、ハハッ。
ja.reading: "Hakanai jinsei no naka de isshun no itoma wo eta" to iu yatsu da, haha'.

ko.title: 잡담・잠깐의 휴식
ko.text: 이른바 「어지러운 속세에서 잠시 동안 한적함을 얻는다」로군, 하하
ko.reading: Ireunba "Eojireoun sokseeseo jamsi dong'an hanjeokhameul eonneunda"-rogun, haha

namecard.description: Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xinyan

en.title: Good Afternoon
en.text: Alright, that's a wrap! *yawns* If there's nothin' else, I'll go take a nap somewhere...

zh.title: 中午好…
zh.text: 啊，收工了收工了，哈…没什么事的话，我去打个盹儿。

ja.title: こんにちは…
ja.text: あがりあがり、ふわぁー——用事がないんならちょっと寝てくる…
ja.reading: Agari agari, fuwaaa⸺ Youji ga nai n nara chotto nete kuru...

ko.title: 점심 인사…
ko.text: 끝났다, 끝났어. 하암——별일 없으면 잠깐 좀 잘래…
ko.reading: Kkeunnatda, kkeunnass-eo. Haam—— byeor-il eobs-eumyeon jamkkan jom jallae...

namecard.description: Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yae Miko

en.title: Chat: Mortal World
en.text: Personally, I think the idea of things staying the same forever is quite beautiful. *sigh* But alas, that is simply not the way the world works.

zh.title: 闲聊・尘世
zh.text: 于我而言，不变也是一种美好，哎呀，可尘世哪是如此不变之物。

ja.title: 世間話・塵世
ja.text: 妾にとって、不変も一種の美。はぁ…じゃが、俗世とはいつまでも変わらぬまま続くものではない…
ja.reading: Warawa ni totte, fuhen mo isshu no bi. Haa... ja ga, zokuse to wa itsu made mo kawaranu mama tsudzuku mono de wa nai...

ko.title: 잡담・속세
ko.text: 난 변하지 않는 것도 일종의 아름다움이라고 생각해. 휴, 하지만 속세에 변하지 않는 게 있을까?
ko.reading: Nan byeonhaji anneun geotdo iljong-ui areumdaumirago saenggakae. Hyu, hajiman soksse-e byeonhaji anneun ge isseulkka?

namecard.description: Justice, signed in scarlet.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yanfei

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: What the... What kind of injurious weather is this!? It's c—cold... Achoo...

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 这…这是什么倒霉天气，有、有点冷哦…阿嚏…

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: はぁ…なんて最悪な天気なんだ…ひ、冷えるな…ハ、ハックション…
ja.reading: Haa... Nante saiaku-na tenki nan da... Hi, hieru-na... Ha, hakkushon...

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 뭐, 뭐야 이 날씨! 좀 춥네…. 엣취…
ko.reading: Mwo, mwoya i nalssi! Jom chumne... etchwi...!

namecard.description: "Can you guess which one here is Yuegui? That's right, all of them are!"
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yaoyao

en.title: When It Rains
en.text: Hey, can you hear the frogs croaking? Hehe, silly frogs! They're singing along to the sound of the rain! Ribbit, ribbit, ribbit~

zh.title: 下雨的时候…
zh.text: 你听，青蛙的叫声，像不像在给雨声伴奏？呱呱呱。
zh.reading: Nǐ tīng, qīngwā de jiàoshēng, xiàngbuxiàng zài gěi yǔshēng bànzòu? Gua gua gua.

ja.title: 雨の日…
ja.text: 聞いて、カエルの鳴き声！雨音の伴奏をしてるみたいだよね？ケロケロケロ～
ja.reading: Kiite, kaeru no nakigoe! Amaoto no bansou wo shiteru mitai da yo ne? Kerokerokero~

ko.title: 비가 올 때…
ko.text: 들어봐, 개구리 우는 소리가 꼭 빗소리에 반주를 넣는 것 같지 않아? 개굴개굴개굴~
ko.reading: Deureobwa, gaeguri uneun soriga kkok bissorie banjureul neonneun geot gachi ana? Gaegulgaegulgaegul~

namecard.description: "Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yelan

en.title: Chat: Truancy
en.text: Good roll... Alright, maybe I'll take one more day off, and knock out the rest of the work once I'm feeling up to it.

zh.title: 闲聊・翘班
zh.text: 点数不错，今天就继续翘班吧，等到状态好了，再去把活一次干完。
zh.reading: Diǎnshù búcuò, jīntiān jiù jìxù qiàobān ba, děngdào zhuàngtài hǎole, zài qù bǎ huó yīcì gànwán.

ja.title: 世間話・サボり
ja.text: 悪くない目が出たわ、今日も引き続きサボりましょう。調子が良くなってから、仕事を一気に終わらせるわよ。
ja.reading: Warukunai me ga detawa, kyou mo hikitsudzuki saborimashou. Chooshi ga yoku natte kara, shigoto wo ikkini owara seru wa yo.

ko.title: 잡담・무단결근
ko.text: 숫자가 괜찮게 나왔네. 그럼 오늘도 계속해서 땡땡이나 쳐볼까나. 일은 컨디션이 좋은 날에 한꺼번에 해치우자고
ko.reading: Sutjaga gwaenchanke nawanne. Geureom oneuldo gyesokhaeseo ttaengttaeng'ina chyeobolkkana. Ireun keondisyeoni joeun nare hankkeobeone haechiujago

namecard.description: Even momentarily sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yoimiya

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: Haha, watch me make a snowball... pew!

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 哈哈，看我搓个雪球，咻——
zh.reading: Haha, kàn wǒ cuō gè xuěqiú, xiū!

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: ははっ、雪球をギュッと、ほれ——
ja.reading: Haha', yukidama wo gyu' to, hore⸺

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 하하, 내가 만든 눈덩이를 봐. 슈욱——
ko.reading: Haha, naega mandeun nundeong'ireul bwa. Syuuk⸺

namecard.description: The yumekui-baku consume nightmares and leave only pleasant dreams. But what if dreams are to be understood in reverse? Faced with such conjecture, her warm-natured response: A truly beautiful dream, even if turned upside down through reality's lens, would still remain beautiful.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yumemizuki Mizuki

en.title: When Thunder Strikes
en.text: Ah, I wonder if the Almighty Shogun is having a bad day...

zh.title: 打雷的时候…
zh.text: 莫非…将军大人今天的心情不好？

ja.title: 雷の日…
ja.text: 今日の将軍…もしかして、ご機嫌ななめ？

ko.title: 번개가 칠 때…
ko.text: 혹시… 오늘 쇼군님의 기분이 안 좋으신 걸까?
ko.reading: Hoksi... Oneul syogunnimui gibuni an joeusin geolkka?

namecard.description: Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yun Jin

voice_actors.actor: Koiwai Kotori (小岩井 ことり)

en.title: When It Snows
en.text: (Translated) Fie! This cold shall be mine end!
en.reading: (Actual Voice-Over: 喂呀，冻煞我了。)Actual Romanization: Wèi ya, dòng shā wǒ liǎo.

zh.title: 下雪的时候…
zh.text: 喂呀，冻煞我了。

ja.title: 雪の日…
ja.text: （訳）ああ、凍えてしまいます。
ja.reading: (Yaku) Aa, kogoete shimaimasu.

ko.title: 눈이 올 때…
ko.text: 흐유, 추워 죽는 줄 알았군
ko.reading: Heuyu, chuwo jungneun jul aratgun

namecard.description: Stars fall, light dims.
sources: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Zhongli

en.title: Chat: Journeys
en.text: Every journey has its final day. Don't rush.

zh.title: 闲聊・旅程
zh.text: 旅程总有一天会迎来终点，不必匆忙。
zh.reading: Lǚchéng zǒngyǒu yìtiān huì yínglái zhōngdiǎn, bùbì cōngmáng.

ja.title: 世間話・旅
ja.text: 旅はいつか終わりを迎える、慌てる必要はない。
ja.reading: Tabi wa itsuka owari wo mukaeru, awateru hitsuyou wa nai.

ko.title: 잡담・여정
ko.text: 여정은 언젠가 끝나게 돼. 그러니 서두를 필요 없어
ko.reading: Yeojeong-eun eonjenga kkeutnage dwae. Geureoni seodureul piryo eopsseo
